example.eg: Fortunately, no one was hurt in the collision.
The debate was a collision of sharply opposing views.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 抵触, 冲突, 意见相左

example.eg: In the head-on collision with the lorry, the Mini came off worst.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迎面碰撞，正面撞上, 正面冲突，直接冲突

example.eg: The two ships were on a collision course, and collided.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 冲撞路线, 冲撞航线

example.eg: His refusal to even listen to other points of view set him on a collision course with nearly everyone he met.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 总是与…冲突, 总是与…意见相左
